alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 2:50PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fulton County through 315 PM EDT... At 250 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Delta, or near Swanton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Swanton around 255 PM EDT. This includes Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 42 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northwestern Ohio.
